mapper.insert: insert into userjoin(userId, userPw, userName, userPhone, userEmail, addrZipNum, addrBasic, addrDetail, birthday) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{addrZipNum}, #{addrBasic}, #{addrDetail}, #{birthday})
